description.short: Render context and syntax for code for GitHub and Azure DevOps repos with links
description.full: This app takes links to lines of code and displays the code with better formatting and context in the message. It shows the source control branch associated with those code lines, and generates a one-click way to open the entire repository for further context of that code snippet. The Code Card work for links generated to reference code in GitHub public repos and all Azure DevOps repos.
